verses.verse: Many <S%H7227>times<s%> they have <S%H6887>afflicted<s%> me from my <S%H5271>youth<s%> <S%H3478>up.<s%> Let Israel now <S%H559>say,<s%>
many <S%H7227>times<s%> they have <S%H6887>afflicted<s%> me from my <S%H5271>youth<s%> <S%H3201>up,<s%> yet they have not prevailed against me.
The <S%H2790>plowers<s%> <S%H2790>plowed<s%> on my <S%H1354>back.<s%> They made their <S%H4618>furrows<s%> <S%H748>long.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous.<s%> He has cut <S%H7112>apart<s%> the <S%H5688>cords<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
Let them be <S%H954>disappointed<s%> and <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>backward,<s%> all those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
Let them be as the <S%H2682>grass<s%> on the <S%H1406>housetops,<s%> which <S%H3001>withers<s%> <S%H6927>before<s%> it grows <S%H8025>up;<s%>
with which the <S%H7114>reaper<s%> <S%H4390>doesn't<s%> fill his <S%H3709>hand,<s%> nor he who binds <S%H6014>sheaves,<s%> his <S%H2683>bosom.<s%>
Neither do those who go <S%H5674>by<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> "The <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> be on <S%H1288>you.<s%> We bless you in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"
